test_cases.objective: To ensure that the document control system correctly implements versioning using the vendor's standard version control.

test_steps.action: Upload a test document to the system.
test_steps.expected_result: Document is successfully uploaded and version 1 is created.

test_steps.action: Modify the document and upload the new version.
test_steps.expected_result: Document is successfully updated and version 2 is created.

acceptance_criteria: Document versions are correctly tracked and displayed
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure document versions are not corrupted

test_cases.objective: To verify that the document control system provides efficient search capabilities using the vendor's standard search engine.

test_steps.action: Perform a search for a specific document using a keyword.
test_steps.expected_result: Search results are displayed within 10 seconds.

test_steps.action: Verify the accuracy of the search results.
test_steps.expected_result: The correct document is retrieved from the search results.

acceptance_criteria: Search results are accurate and returned within the specified time
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure search results are not corrupted

test_cases.objective: Verify that the system correctly implements document versioning using the vendor's standard version control.

test_steps.action: Upload a test document to the system.
test_steps.expected_result: Document is successfully uploaded and version 1.0 is created.

test_steps.action: Modify the document and upload it again.
test_steps.expected_result: Document is updated and version 2.0 is created.

test_steps.action: View the version history of the document.
test_steps.expected_result: Version history displays both versions with correct timestamps and user information.

acceptance_criteria: Document versions are correctly incremented
Version history is accurately maintained
data_integrity_requirements: Version numbers must be unique and sequential
Version history must be immutable

test_cases.objective: Verify that document searches complete within the specified time frame using the vendor's standard search engine.

test_steps.action: Perform a search for a document using a known keyword.
test_steps.expected_result: Search results are displayed within 10 seconds.

test_steps.action: Perform a search for a document using a partial keyword.
test_steps.expected_result: Search results are displayed within 10 seconds.

test_steps.action: Perform a search for a document using metadata filters.
test_steps.expected_result: Search results are displayed within 10 seconds.

acceptance_criteria: All searches complete within 10 seconds
Search results are accurate and relevant
data_integrity_requirements: Search results must be consistent with the indexed documents

test_cases.objective: Verify that the document control system correctly implements versioning using the vendor's standard version control.

test_steps.action: Upload a test document to the system.
test_steps.expected_result: Document is successfully uploaded and version 1 is created.

test_steps.action: Modify the document and upload the new version.
test_steps.expected_result: Document is successfully updated and version 2 is created.

acceptance_criteria: Document versions are correctly tracked and displayed.
Version history is accessible.
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure document versions are not corrupted during upload.

test_cases.objective: Verify that document searches complete within the specified time frame using the vendor's standard search engine.

test_steps.action: Perform a search for a specific document using a keyword.
test_steps.expected_result: Search results are displayed within 10 seconds.

acceptance_criteria: Search results are displayed within 10 seconds.
Search results are accurate.
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure search results are not corrupted.

test_cases.objective: Verify that the system correctly implements document versioning using the vendor's standard version control.
prerequisites: Test document is available for upload

test_steps.action: Upload a test document to the system.
test_steps.expected_result: Document is successfully uploaded and initial version is created.

test_steps.action: Modify the document and upload the updated version.
test_steps.expected_result: System creates a new version of the document and maintains the previous version.

test_steps.action: Retrieve previous versions of the document.
test_steps.expected_result: System displays all previous versions with correct version numbers and timestamps.

acceptance_criteria: All document versions are correctly maintained and retrievable.
Version numbers increment sequentially.
Previous versions are not editable.
data_integrity_requirements: Version history must be immutable
All versions must be traceable

test_cases.objective: Validate that document searches complete within 10 seconds using the system's default indexing.
prerequisites: Test documents (minimum 100) are uploaded to the system

test_steps.action: Execute a search for a specific document by its exact title.
test_steps.expected_result: Correct document is returned in search results within 10 seconds.

test_steps.action: Execute a search using partial document title keywords.
test_steps.expected_result: All relevant documents are returned in search results within 10 seconds.

test_steps.action: Execute a search using metadata filters (e.g., document type, author).
test_steps.expected_result: Filtered documents are returned in search results within 10 seconds.

acceptance_criteria: All searches complete within 10 seconds.
Search results are accurate and complete.
System performance is consistent across multiple search types.
data_integrity_requirements: Search results must be complete and accurate
Indexing must be maintained consistently

test_cases.objective: Verify that the system correctly implements document versioning using the vendor's standard version control.
prerequisites: Test document is available for upload

test_steps.action: Upload a test document to the system.
test_steps.expected_result: Document is successfully uploaded and version 1.0 is created.

test_steps.action: Modify the document and upload it again.
test_steps.expected_result: Document is updated and version 2.0 is created.

test_steps.action: View the version history of the document.
test_steps.expected_result: Version history displays both versions with correct timestamps and user information.

acceptance_criteria: Document versions are correctly incremented and displayed.
Version history includes all relevant metadata.
data_integrity_requirements: Version numbers must be accurate and immutable.
All version changes must be logged in the audit trail.

test_cases.objective: Verify that document searches complete within the specified time limit using the vendor's standard search engine.
prerequisites: At least 100 test documents are uploaded to the system

test_steps.action: Perform a search for a specific document using a unique keyword.
test_steps.expected_result: Search results are displayed within 10 seconds.

test_steps.action: Perform a search using a partial keyword to retrieve multiple documents.
test_steps.expected_result: Search results are displayed within 10 seconds.

test_steps.action: Perform a search with no results expected.
test_steps.expected_result: System returns 'No results found' within 10 seconds.

acceptance_criteria: All searches complete within 10 seconds.
Search results are accurate and complete.
data_integrity_requirements: Search results must be consistent with the indexed documents.
No documents should be missing from the search results.

test_cases.objective: To ensure that document searches complete within 10 seconds using default indexing as per URS-DOC-011.

test_steps.action: Perform a search for a specific document using the system's search engine.
test_steps.expected_result: The search results are displayed within 10 seconds.

acceptance_criteria: Search results are displayed within 10 seconds
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure search results are accurate and complete

test_cases.objective: To confirm that document uploads complete within 2 minutes for files up to 50MB as per URS-DOC-013.

test_steps.action: Upload a 50MB document to the system.
test_steps.expected_result: The document upload completes within 2 minutes.

acceptance_criteria: Document upload completes within 2 minutes
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure uploaded document is intact and accessible

test_cases.objective: To ensure that the document search functionality completes within 10 seconds as specified in URS-DOC-011.

test_steps.action: Perform a search for a specific document using the search engine.
test_steps.expected_result: The search results are displayed within 10 seconds.

acceptance_criteria: Search results are displayed within 10 seconds
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure search results are accurate and complete

test_cases.objective: To confirm that document uploads complete within 2 minutes for files up to 50MB as per URS-DOC-013.

test_steps.action: Upload a 50MB document to the system.
test_steps.expected_result: The document upload completes within 2 minutes.

acceptance_criteria: Document upload completes within 2 minutes
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure uploaded document is intact and accessible

test_cases.objective: Verify that the system correctly implements document versioning using the vendor's standard version control features.
prerequisites: Test document uploaded to the system

test_steps.action: Upload a test document to the system and check it in.
test_steps.expected_result: Document is successfully uploaded and checked in.

test_steps.action: Modify the document and check it in again.
test_steps.expected_result: New version of the document is created and version number increments.

test_steps.action: Retrieve previous versions of the document.
test_steps.expected_result: System displays all previous versions with correct metadata.

acceptance_criteria: Document versions are correctly tracked and incremented.
Previous versions are retrievable with accurate metadata.
data_integrity_requirements: Version history must be immutable
Metadata must be accurate and complete

test_cases.objective: Verify that document searches complete within 10 seconds using the system's default indexing.
prerequisites: Test documents uploaded to the system

test_steps.action: Upload 100 test documents with varied metadata.
test_steps.expected_result: All documents are successfully uploaded and indexed.

test_steps.action: Perform a search for a specific document using known metadata.
test_steps.expected_result: Search completes within 10 seconds and returns correct document.

test_steps.action: Perform a broad search with multiple criteria.
test_steps.expected_result: Search completes within 10 seconds and returns all relevant documents.

acceptance_criteria: All searches complete within 10 seconds
Search results are accurate and complete
data_integrity_requirements: Search results must be complete and accurate
Indexing must be consistent

test_cases.objective: Verify that the system correctly enforces document retention policies as per vendor's lifecycle management features.
prerequisites: User with admin privileges is logged in

test_steps.action: Upload a test document and set a retention policy of 30 days.
test_steps.expected_result: Document is successfully uploaded and retention policy is applied.

test_steps.action: Attempt to delete the document before the retention period expires.
test_steps.expected_result: System prevents deletion and displays an appropriate error message.

test_steps.action: Wait for the retention period to expire and attempt to delete the document.
test_steps.expected_result: System allows deletion or archives the document as per configured policy.

acceptance_criteria: System enforces retention policies correctly
Appropriate error messages are displayed for policy violations
Documents are handled correctly after retention period expires
data_integrity_requirements: Document lifecycle must be controlled and auditable
Retention policies must be enforced without exception

test_cases.objective: Validate that the system correctly integrates with Active Directory using the vendor's LDAP connector for user authentication.

test_steps.action: Configure the system to connect to Active Directory using the LDAP connector.
test_steps.expected_result: System successfully connects to Active Directory.

test_steps.action: Attempt to log in using an AD user account with valid credentials.
test_steps.expected_result: User is successfully authenticated and granted appropriate access.

test_steps.action: Attempt to log in using an AD user account with invalid credentials.
test_steps.expected_result: System rejects login attempt and displays appropriate error message.

acceptance_criteria: System successfully connects to Active Directory
Valid AD users can authenticate successfully
Invalid login attempts are properly rejected
User permissions are correctly mapped
data_integrity_requirements: User authentication must be secure and reliable
Access control must be properly enforced

test_cases.objective: Verify that the document check-in/check-out functionality works as expected using standard library functions.

test_steps.action: Log in to the document management system with a valid user account.
test_steps.expected_result: User is successfully logged in and can access the document library.

test_steps.action: Navigate to a test document and select the 'Check Out' option.
test_steps.expected_result: Document is checked out and locked for editing by other users.

test_steps.action: Make a minor edit to the document and select 'Check In'.
test_steps.expected_result: Document is successfully checked in and version is incremented.

acceptance_criteria: Document check-out locks the document for editing by others
Document check-in increments the version number
Edit history is accurately recorded
data_integrity_requirements: Document version history must be maintained accurately
Audit trail must record check-in/check-out events

test_cases.objective: Validate that document searches complete within the required 10-second timeframe using default indexing.

test_steps.action: Log in to the document management system with a valid user account.
test_steps.expected_result: User is successfully logged in and can access the search function.

test_steps.action: Execute a search for a known document using its exact title.
test_steps.expected_result: Document is found within 10 seconds.

test_steps.action: Execute a complex search using multiple keywords and metadata filters.
test_steps.expected_result: Results are returned within 10 seconds.

acceptance_criteria: All searches complete within 10 seconds
Search results are accurate and complete
System performance meets vendor specifications
data_integrity_requirements: Search results must be complete and accurate
Indexing must be maintained properly
